result.title: Problem with LCS
result.content: After running LCS on two strings A and B, the 2D array DP is filled with values.Now if the 2D array is given , how can I assume string A and B ?Let the length of A and B are n and m respectively, then 1 <= n , m <= 25. It is guaranteed that A and B contain only lowercase English letters. //Sorry for my bad English
